tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE network_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  latency FLOAT,
  packet_loss FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE network_latency_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    latency_ms FLOAT,
    packet_loss_percentage FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE device_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_name VARCHAR,
    device_type VARCHAR,
    location VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE connectivity_issues (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    issue_id VARCHAR,
    description TEXT,
    severity VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE resolved_issues (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    issue_id VARCHAR,
    resolution TEXT,
    resolved_by VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE network_latency_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    source_ip VARCHAR(255),
    destination_ip VARCHAR(255),
    latency_ms FLOAT,
    packet_loss FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE connectivity_issues (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    issue_type VARCHAR(255),
    description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE resolved_issues (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    issue_id INT,
    resolution_time TIMESTAMP,
    resolution_details TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE network_devices (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_name VARCHAR(255),
    device_type VARCHAR(255),
    location VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE network_engineers (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    engineer_name VARCHAR(255),
    expertise_area VARCHAR(255)
)
